title: styles.css
content: body { margin:0px; padding:0px; text-align:center; background-image: url(/images/bg_gen0.gif); background-repeat:repeat-x; background-color:#B8B9BC; font-family:Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size:10px; } #main { text-align:left; width:930px; } table { font-size:10px; } .uppercase { text-transform: uppercase; } .discount-green { color:#87b616; font-weight:bold; } #topleft{ width:299px; background-image: url(/images/bg_bottomleft.gif); background-repeat: repeat-y; } #topboxsx { background-image: url(/images/topleft.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; margin-top:0px; margin-left:20px; width:263px; height:256px; } #logo { margin:0px 0px 75px 15px; } #mainmsg { padding:0px 6px; margin:5px 13px 0px 10px; color:white; height:124px; text-align:justify; } #boxsx{ background-color:#D9D7D8; border-left:1px solid #455878; border-top:1px solid #455878; min-height:141px; margin:0px; padding:0px 0px 0px 26px; } * html body #boxsx { height:141px; } #improve { margin:8px 0px 0px; } #improve table { font-size:9px; } table #security { margin:20px 15px 0px 0px; width:255px; font-size:10px; } #securitydown { margin-left:27px; } #sottoboxsx{ background-image: url(/images/sottoboxsx.gif); } #bottomleft{ width:299px; background-image: url(/images/bg_bottomleft.gif); background-repeat: repeat-y; } #topdest{ margin-top:0px; margin-left:21px; background-color:white; width:257px; } .matchingCity { background-color: white; margin-left: 21px; margin-top: 30px; width: 257px; border-bottom: 1px solid #6281B8; } .matchingCity h3 { border-bottom: 1px solid #6281B8; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; margin: 0; padding: 8px 4px 8px 14px; } .matchingCity p { font-size: 13px; padding: 4px 4px 4px 14px; background-color: #BECEDD; } .matchingCity a:link, .matchingCity a:visited { color:black; } #right { background-color:white; background-image: url(/images/bg_right.gif); background-repeat:repeat-y; } #lang { background-image: url(/images/bg_lang.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; width:631px; height:27px; border-bottom:1px solid #455878; } * html body #lang { height:28px; } #bottomlang { background-image: url(/images/bg_bottomlang.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; width:631px; height:6px; } #searchform, #homeimage { border-left:1px solid #455878; border-right:1px solid #455878; background-color:white; } #homeimage { background-image: url(/images/athens.jpg); background-repeat:no-repeat; height:169px; } #searchform { padding: 0px 16px 1px; } * html body #searchform { padding: 0px 16px 0px; } table.searchtable { width:597px; } table.searchtable td { padding:1px 0px 2px; } #subsearch, #subsearch2 { width:631px; background-repeat:no-repeat; font-size:2px; height:12px; } #subsearch{ background-image:url(/images/subsearch.gif); } #subsearch2 { background-image:url(/images/subsearch_1.gif); } #menu, #menu2 { width:631px; height:58px; background-repeat:no-repeat; margin:0px 0px; padding:4px 0px 0px; } #menu { background-image: url(/images/bg_menu_0.gif); } #menu2 { background-image: url(/images/bg_menu_1.gif); } * html body #menu, * html body #menu2 { margin:0px 0px 0px; padding:3px 0px 0px; height:60px; } #maintitle, #maintitle2 { margin:0px; background-repeat:no-repeat; width:631px; height:39px; } #maintitle { background-image: url(/images/bg_maintitle.gif); } #maintitle2 { background-image: url(/images/bg_maintitle_1.gif); } #maincont { border-left:1px solid #455878; border-right:1px solid #455878; background-color:white; padding: 0px 3px 0px 5px; } table.magazine { margin: 10px 0px 0px; } td.tdmagazine{ font-weight: bold; border-right: 1px dashed #455878; border-left: 1px dashed #455878; background-color: #F6EFD3; margin: 0px 0px 4px; padding: 0px 0px 4px; } table.magazineart { width: 608px; vertical-align: top; margin-left: 4px; margin-right: 4px; padding: 0px; margin-top: 4px; } table.magazineart td{ vertical-align: top; border-bottom: 1px dashed #455878; margin: 0px; padding : 6px 6px 6px 2px; text-align: justify; font-size: 12px; } .article-body { width:390px; } .article-body img { max-width:390px !important; } td.tdmagazine{ font-weight: bold; border-right : 1px dashed #455878; border-left : 1px dashed #455878; background-color: #F6EFD3; margin: 0px 0px 4px; padding: 0px 0px 4px; } p.moreart { padding-left: 109px; margin: 0px; padding-top: 0px; padding-right: 0px; padding-bottom: 0px; } a.moreart { TEXT-ALIGN: left; } a.moreart:link { COLOR: #02339A; TEXT-DECORATION: none; } a.moreart:visited { COLOR: #666666; TEXT-DECORATION: none; } a.moreart:hover { TEXT-DECORATION: underline; } div.artright { float: right; position: relative; margin-right: 0px; margin-left: 8px; padding: 0px; margin-top: 2px; margin-bottom: 4px; } table.magazineother { background-color: #F6EFD3; border: 1px dashed #455878; width: 202px; padding: 4px; margin-left:4px; } table.admintable { margin:4px; width:600px; } table.admintable td { padding:4px; } p.navig { margin:4px 0px; } table.myclubtable { width:580px; border-left: 1px dashed #455878; border-top: 1px dashed #455878; } table.myclubtable td { border-right: 1px dashed #455878; border-bottom: 1px dashed #455878; } table.magazineother td{ } table.magazine1{ font-size: 12px; vertical-align: top; text-align: justify; padding: 0px; } td.tdmagmargin { font-weight: normal; padding: 6px; } TABLE.magazine2 { background-color: #FFFFFF; background-color: #F6EFD3; border: 1px dashed #455878; vertical-align: top; padding: 0px; width: 602px; } TABLE.magazine2 td{ background-color: #FFFFFF; background-color: #F6EFD3; vertical-align: top; padding: 4px; font-weight: bold; } #bottom { background-image: url(/images/bg_bottom.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; width:631px; height:20px; } .highlight, .hotel { width:616px; border-left:1px solid #455878; border-right:1px solid #455878; background-color:white; padding:0px 0px; } * html body .highlight, * html body .hotel { width:618px; margin:0px; } .tophighlight { width:618px; height:13px; background-image: url(/images/topbox.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; margin:0px; } .tophotel { width:618px; height:29px; background-image: url(/images/head_hotel.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; border-bottom:1px solid #455878; margin:0px; } .subtitle { font-size:12px; font-weight:bold; } table.hotelhead { margin:4px 0px 0px; } table.hotelhead td { padding:2px 10px; font-weight:bold; font-size:13px; } TABLE.countriestable { WIDTH: 100% } P.citycountry { FONT-WEIGHT: bold; MARGIN-LEFT: 13px; TEXT-ALIGN: left; text-indent: -13px; font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; padding-top: 4px; padding-left: 6px; } td.hotelleft { padding:4px; } td.hotelright { padding:4px 20px; } div.facilities { margin:6px 0px 1px; padding-bottom:2px; border-bottom:none; border-top: 1px dashed #455878; padding-top: 6px; } .hostel-facilities .item { float:left; width:50%; } .separator { border-bottom:1px dashed #455878; margin:2px 0px 2px; font-size:2px; } .bottomhighlight, .bottomhotel { width:618px; height:16px; background-image: url(/images/bottombox.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; margin:0px; } .topocra { font-size:2px; width:301px; height:9px; background-image: url(/images/topbox_ocra.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; } .titleocra { width:299px; border-left:1px solid #455878; border-right:1px solid #455878; background-color:#ddcb79; font-weight:bold; } * html body .titleocra { width:301px; } .sfumatocra { font-size:2px; width:299px; height:6px; background-image: url(/images/sfumat_ocra.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; border-left:1px solid #455878; border-right:1px solid #455878; } * html body .sfumatocra { width:301px; } td.tdbox{ background-image: url(/images/bg_tdbox.gif); background-repeat:repeat-y; } .box { width:300px; border-top:1px solid #455878; } * html body .box { width:301px; } .subbox { width:299px; } * html body .subbox { width:301px; } .bottomocra { font-size:2px; width:301px; height:17px; background-image: url(/images/bottombox_ocra.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; margin:0px 0px ; } #footersx { padding-left:20px; } #footerdx { background-image: url(/images/footer_dx.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; width:631px; padding:26px 0px 10px; } .facilities, .greyback { padding:0px 3px; } /* stili testo */ .topcitiestitle { margin:0px; font-size:13px; font-weight:bold; padding:8px 4px 8px 14px; border-bottom:1px solid #6281b8; } p.topdest, p.topdest1 { font-size:13px; margin:0px; padding:4px 4px 4px 14px; border-bottom:1px solid #6281b8; } p { margin:0px;} p.text { margin:4px 0px;} p.order { margin:0px; font-weight:bold; } p.lang { padding:6px 16px 0px; text-align:right; font-size:9px; color:#02339a; } p.menutop { padding:6px 8px 0px; text-align:left; font-size:13px; font-weight:bold; } p.menubottom{ padding:12px 9px 0px; font-size:10px; margin:0px; } p.standard { margin: 8px 0px; } p.topdest{ background-color:#BECEDD; } .nomargin { margin:0px; } p.boldtitle { font-size:13px; font-weight:bold; padding:0px 0px 8px; } p.formtitle { font-size:12px; font-weight:bold; padding:0px 0px 8px; } p.improvetitle { font-size:10px; font-weight:bold; text-transform:lowercase; } p.formtitle { padding:1px 0px 2px; } p.mainmsg { margin:0px 0px 6px; } p.maintitle , p.maintitle2 { padding:10px 16px 0px; color:#657fb8; font-weight:bold; font-size:13px; } p.maintitle td { color:#657fb8; font-weight:bold; font-size:13px; padding: 0px; } p.highltext { color:#02339a; font-size:13px; margin:0px 4px; text-align:justify; } p.titlebox { font-size:12px; margin:0px 8px; } p.subtitlebox { margin:4px 8px ; } p.boxtext { margin:4px 8px 0px; text-align:justify; } p.footer { text-align:center; color:white; font-weight:bold; } p.hoteldata { font-weight:bold; } p.hoteldescription { font-weight:normal; text-align: justify; } p.titlebox{ text-transform:uppercase; } p.subtitlebox { font-weight:bold; } td.pulsbook { background-image:url(/images/puls_book_bg.gif); background-repeat:repeat-x; } td.pulsinfo { background-image:url(/images/puls_info_bg.gif); background-repeat:repeat-x; text-align:center; } table.tbpulsbook{ height:21px; margin:0px; } table.tbpulsbook td{ padding:0px; } p.securetxt { color:#02339a; font-size:12px; margin:0px 8px; text-align:justify; padding-top: 4px; } #textstep3 { width: 610px; padding: 0px; margin-left: 8px; font-size: 12px; color: #02339A; text-align: justify; } TABLE.step30 { border-top: 1px solid #455878; border-left: 1px solid #455878; width: 616px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: middle; margin-right: 2px; margin-left: 2px; background-color: #F9F9F9; } TABLE.step30 td { padding: 4px; border-right: 1px solid #455878; border-bottom: 1px solid #455878; vertical-align: middle; } td.tdbggrigio { background-color: #D4D3D3; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; font-size: 12px; vertical-align: middle; } TABLE.secure { width: 618px; text-align: right; font-size: 10px; margin-top: 4px; margin-bottom: 0px; color: #02339A; } td.tdbggrigiocenter { background-color: #E3DDC9; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; font-size: 12px; vertical-align: middle; } td.tdbggrigioleft { background-color: #E3DDC9; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; font-size: 12px; vertical-align: middle; } td.tdbggrigioright { background-color: #E3DDC9; text-align: right; font-weight: bold; font-size: 12px; vertical-align: middle; } td.tdgrigiotxtcenter { text-align: center; font-weight: normal; font-size: 10px; vertical-align: middle; } td.tdgrigiotxtleft { text-align: left; font-weight: normal; font-size: 10px; vertical-align: middle; } td.tdgrigiotxtright { text-align: right; font-weight: normal; font-size: 10px; vertical-align: middle; } p.date1 { text-align:left; font-size:12px; padding-left: 38px; } td.tdbggrigioright1 { background-color: #E3DDC9; text-align: right; font-weight: bold; font-size: 12px; vertical-align: middle; color: #d82916; } TABLE.step31 { width: 612px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: middle; margin-right: 4px; margin-left: 4px; background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #455878; } TABLE.step31 td { padding: 4px; vertical-align: middle; } td.tdbggiallo { background-color: #DECD7B; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; font-size: 12px; vertical-align: middle; border-bottom: 1px solid #455878; } input.mail { font-weight: normal; font-size: 10px; color: #000000; width: 120px; } td.tdtratteggio { font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold; border-bottom: 1px dashed #455878; } p.personaldata { text-align:left; font-size:12px; font-weight: bold; } td.personaldata { vertical-align: middle; font-size: 10px; width: 25%; } TABLE.personaldata { padding: 0px; vertical-align: middle; background-color: #F6EFD3; border: 1px dashed #455878; width: 608px; margin: 8px 4px 0px; } TABLE.personaldata td { padding: 4px; } select.mail { font-weight: normal; font-size: 10px; background-color: white; text-align: left; border: 1px solid #455878; color: #000000; width: 120px; } p.password { font-size: 10px; line-height: normal; padding-left: 16px; vertical-align: middle; padding-bottom: 5px; text-decoration: none; } TABLE.login { padding: 0px; vertical-align: middle; background-color: #F6EFD3; border: 1px dashed #455878; width: 608px; margin-top: 12px; margin-right: 4px; margin-left: 4px; margin-bottom: 4px; } TABLE.login td { padding: 4px 6px; font-size: 12px; } input.mail1 { font-weight: normal; font-size: 10px; color: #000000; width: 120px; } a.password { TEXT-ALIGN: left; } a.password:link { COLOR: #02339A; TEXT-DECORATION: none; } a.password:visited { COLOR: #02339A; TEXT-DECORATION: none; } a.password:hover { TEXT-DECORATION: underline; } td.personaldata1 { vertical-align: top; font-size: 10px; width: 25%; } TABLE.personaldata1 { background-color: #FFFFFF; width: 608px; vertical-align: top; margin: 8px 4px 0px; } TABLE.personaldata1 td { vertical-align: top; padding: 4px; } textarea.mail { font-weight: normal; font-size: 10px; color: #000000; width: 120px; } TABLE.credit { background-color: #FFFFFF; width: 602px; vertical-align: middle; margin-top: 2px; } select.credit { font-weight: normal; font-size: 10px; background-color: white; text-align: left; border: 1px solid #455878; color: #000000; width: 45px; } select.credit1 { font-weight: normal; font-size: 10px; background-color: white; text-align: left; border: 1px solid #455878; color: #000000; width: 70px; } td.tdtratteggio2 { font-size: 9px; font-weight: normal; border-top-width: 1px; border-top-style: dashed; border-top-color: #455878; } td.tdconfirm{ font-size: 10px; } td.tdpuls{ text-align: right; } input.pulsconfirm { border:1px solid #4e6086; background-color:#7e9dba; font-weight:bold; margin-right: 30px; width: 120px; text-align: center; } p.confirmtxt { color:#000000; font-size:12px; margin:6px 10px 0px; text-align:justify; } p.confirmtxtred { color:#d82916; font-size:12px; margin:4px 10px 0px; text-align:justify; font-weight: bold; } TABLE.confirm { background-color: #FFFFFF; width: 608px; background-color: #F6EFD3; border: 1px dashed #455878; vertical-align: top; margin-left: 4px; margin-right: 4px; padding: 0px; } TABLE.confirm td{ padding: 4px; font-size: 12px; } input.pulsdetails { border:1px solid #4e6086; background-color:#7e9dba; font-weight:bold; margin-right: 4px; text-align: center; } TABLE.steps { width: 616px; vertical-align: middle; margin: 0px 2px; border-top: 1px dashed #455878; border-bottom: 1px dashed #455878; } TABLE.steps td{ margin: 4px; padding: 3px; } td.tdstepblack { color: #000000; } td.tdstepred { color: #D82916; font-weight: bold; } td.tdstepgray { color: #999999; } .ratingbox2 { FONT-SIZE: 9px; WIDTH: 168px; TEXT-ALIGN: left; border: 1px solid #637DB8; padding: 5px 2px; } .ratingbox { FONT-SIZE: 9px; WIDTH: 168px; TEXT-ALIGN: left; padding: 5px 2px; border-right: 1px solid #637DB8; border-bottom: 1px solid #637DB8; border-left: 1px solid #637DB8; } .ratingtitle { FONT-SIZE: 10px; TEXT-ALIGN: left; font-weight: bold; border-top-width: 1px; border-top-style: solid; border-top-color: #455878; padding-top: 8px; padding-bottom: 8px; } .ratingvoci { FONT-SIZE: 9px; TEXT-ALIGN: left; font-weight: normal; vertical-align: top; padding-bottom: 2px; } .ratingreview { FONT-SIZE: 9px; TEXT-ALIGN: left; font-weight: normal; padding-top: 4px; } td.hotelleft2 { padding:4px; background-color: #F6EFD3; border: 1px dashed #455878; width: 168px; } TABLE.hotelsearch { border-top: 1px solid #455878; border-left: 1px solid #455878; width: 615px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; vertical-align: middle; margin-right: 2px; margin-bottom: 4px; margin-left: 2px; } TABLE.hotelsearch td { padding: 2px; border-right : 1px solid #455878; border-bottom : 1px solid #455878; margin: 2px; vertical-align: middle; } p.date { text-align:left; font-size:13px; color:#02339a; } TABLE.date { width: 608px; margin: 0px 4px; padding: 0px; } td.tdbg { background-color: #DECD7B; text-align: left; font-weight: bold; font-size: 12px; height: 20px; vertical-align: middle; } td.tdtype { background-color: #F6EFD3; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; font-size: 10px; vertical-align: middle; } td.tdwc { background-color: #F6EFD3; text-align: center; font-weight: normal; font-size: 10px; vertical-align: middle; } span.greennum { foint-weight: bold; color: white; background-color: #5C77B3; } span.greynum { color: #999999; } .bold { font-weight:bold; } .yellow { color: orange; font-weight: bold; } .green { color: green; font-weight: bold; } .uc { text-transform: uppercase; } select.hotelselect { font-size: 10px; width: 50px; } input.totalbeds { font-weight: bold; font-size: 12px; background-color: white; text-align: center; width: 25px; border: 1px solid #B5A363; color: #455878; } td.tdbeds { background-color: #E6E9ED; text-align: right; font-weight: normal; font-size: 12px; vertical-align: middle; height: 30px; } p.availabilitytxt { color:#02339a; font-size:12px; margin:0px 4px; text-align:justify; } .blue { color:#02339a; } .white { color:white; } .red { color:#d82916; } .lightblue { color:#657fb8; } .improveblue{ color:#657fb8; text-transform:lowercase; } .errormsg , .errmessage, .finn_errmessage { color: #d82916; font-weight:bold; } .avail { padding:3px 4px 4px 2px; height:21px; width:21px; background-image:url(images/avail.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; font-weight:bold; } .notav { padding:3px 3px 4px; height:21px; width:21px; background-image:url(images/notavail.gif); background-repeat:no-repeat; } input.formelement, select.formelement { width:164px; font-size:12px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #4e6086; } input.pulsub { border:1px solid #4e6086; background-color:#7e9dba; font-weight:bold; cursor:pointer; } input.pag, select.pag, select.pag2 , select.pag3 { font-size:12px; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #4e6086; } select.pag { width:46px; } select.pag2 { width:50px; } select.pag3 { width:60px; } form { margin:0px; padding:0px; } img.artthumb{ border:1px solid #657FBA; margin:4px; } img.hotelthumb{ border:1px solid #657FBA; margin-bottom:4px; } p.confirmtxt { color:#000000; font-size:12px; margin:6px 10px 0px; text-align:justify; } p.confirmtxtred { color:#d82916; font-size:12px; margin:4px 10px 0px; text-align:justify; font-weight: bold; } TABLE.confirm { background-color: #FFFFFF; width: 608px; background-color: #F6EFD3; border: 1px dashed #455878; vertical-align: top; margin-left: 4px; margin-right: 4px; padding: 0px; } TABLE.confirm td{ padding: 4px; font-size: 12px; } input.pulsdetails { border:1px solid #4e6086; background-color:#7e9dba; font-weight:bold; margin-right: 4px; text-align: center; } /*gestione link */ /* gestione generale*/ a:link, a:visited { color:#02339a; text-decoration:none; font-weight:bold; } a:hover { text-decoration:underline; } /* gestione tipi di link*/ a.topcities:link, a.topcities:visited { text-decoration:none; color:black; font-weight:normal; } a.topcities:hover { text-decoration:underline; } a.afooter:link, a.afooter:visited { text-transform:capitalize; text-decoration:none; color:white; } a.afooter:hover { text-decoration:underline; } a.pulsbooka:link, a.pulsbooka:visited { color:black; font-size:10px; text-decoration:none; padding:0px 4px; } a.pulsinfo:link, a.pulsinfo:visited { color:black; font-size:10px; text-decoration:none; padding:0px 4px; } a.improve:link, a.improve:visited { color:black; text-decoration:none; text-transform:lowercase; font-weight:normal; } a.improve:hover { text-decoration:underline; } a.readmore:link, a.readmore:visited { color:#02339a; text-decoration:none; font-weight:bold; } a.readmore:hover { text-decoration:underline; } a.readmorehl:link, a.readmorehl:visited { color:#02339a; text-decoration:none; font-weight:bold; } a.readmorehl:hover { text-decoration:underline; } A.citycountry { TEXT-ALIGN: left; } A.citycountry:link { COLOR: #02339A; TEXT-DECORATION: none; } A.citycountry:visited { COLOR: #666666; TEXT-DECORATION: none; } A.citycountry:hover { TEXT-DECORATION: underline; } a.menulink:link,a.menulink:visited { text-transform:capitalize; color:black; TEXT-DECORATION: none; } a.menulink:hover { TEXT-DECORATION: underline; } /* a.availabilitytxt { text-align: left; color: red; } a.availabilitytxt:link { color: red; text-decoration: none; font-weight: bold; } a.availabilitytxt:visited { color: #666666; text-decoration: none; } a.availabilitytxt:hover { text-decoration: underline; padding:0px; margin:4px 0px 4px; text-align:left; } .boximage { margin:4px 8px 4px 0px; border:1px solid #6281b8; } .stateprovtitle { padding:4px; font-weight:bold; color:#02339a; } .statesprovinces { } table.stateprovtable{ display:none; } #fade_map { width: 100%; height: 100%; top: 0px; left: 0px; position: fixed; display: none; background: url(images/map_back.png) repeat; z-index: 39; } * html body #fade_map { background-image: none; position:absolute; } #fade_map table { width: 100%; height: 100%; } #popup { background-color: #FFF; width: 90%; border: 2px solid #A0A0A4; display: none; } #popup #title { background-color: #DDD; width: 100%; height: 16px; border-bottom: 2px solid #A0A0A4; text-align: right; padding-top: 3px; } #popup #hide_map { margin-right: 3px; } #popup #map { width: 100%; height: 500px; } .hoteldata #map { border: 1px solid #455878;
